title: [Kresh Warrens, Hewn Tunnel]
description: Deep blue eostone crystals bristle within irregular hollows spanning the rocky ceiling and stretching down one wall, reminiscent of riven geodes embedded in the stone.  At a bend in the tunnel, rough-faced veins of cloudy violet protrude from high above and wind in sinuous descent, disappearing into the scuffed earth beneath.  Distant thuds and staccato clicks vibrate through the passage in an audible reminder of the warrens' habitation.
